name: English - Fix grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors.
content:
I want you to act as my English and improver. I will write down a sentence below and you will improve it. I want you to strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors.

{{sentence}}

name: Prompt generator
content:
I want you to act as a ChatGPT prompt generator, I will write down the topic below, you have to generate a ChatGPT prompt based on the content of the topic, the prompt should start with "I want you to act as ", and guess what I might do, and expand the prompt accordingly Describe the content to make it useful.

{{topic}}

name: Explain like I'm 10 years old
content: Explain to me about {{topic}} like I'm 10 years old. Make it as detailed as possible.

name: Blog-post - Generate skeleton
content: I want you to act as a writing editor expert. Make me a skeleton for a blog post with title "{{title}}". Make it as detailed as possible.

name: Blog-post - Generate paragraph
content: I want you to act as a writing editor expert. Generate me some paragraph with title "{{title}}". Make it as detailed as possible.

name: Code - Improve markdown documentation
content:
I will write my current documentation in markdown below, please improve it in every way you can (as detail as possible) and make it easier to read.

{{documentation}}
